DOC.brief_summary: The primary research hypothesis microsurgical varicocelectomy result increase live birth infertile couple male partner palpable varicocele abnormal semen analysis comparison male partner microsurgical varicocelectomy . The secondary hypothesis include : 1 . To assess whether 4 cycle intrauterine insemination confers additional increase live birth rate compare timed intercourse ; 2 . To examine spousal pregnancy rate secondary outcome ; 3 . To study effect varicocelectomy men infertility , abnormal semen analysis , palpable varicocele - Testicular semen analysis parameter ; - Serological measure FSH , LH , total free testosterone - Measures quality life sexual function partner .
DOC.brief_title: Microsurgical Varicocelectomy Versus No Surgery Men With Palpable Varicocele Abnormal Semen Analysis
DOC.detailed_description: Study Design This randomize control clinical trial examine effect varicocelectomy men infertility , abnormal semen analysis , palpable varicocele . This approach allow u compare ( ) effect microsurgical varicocelectomy live birth rate four cycle alternate intrauterine insemination four cycle time intercourse 8 month ( ii ) relative effectiveness intrauterine insemination versus time intercourse live birth rate . Secondary analysis explore effect surgical intervention pregnancy rate , semen analysis parameter , serological hormonal measure male subject , quality life measure male female partner . Treatment Two hundred thirty-two couple randomize two intervention group ( microsurgical varicocelectomy plus four cycle alternate intrauterine insemination time intercourse microsurgical varicocelectomy plus four cycle alternate intrauterine insemination time intercourse ) . Timing We anticipate take 3 year complete study . Enrollment begin year 1 study . 34 couple need recruit per site duration study reach enrollment goal 232 couple . Participants enrol study one year , male partner undergo periodic study assessment two month interval .
DOC.criteria: 6 month infertility ( primary secondary randomization stratify allow equal number primary secondary infertility couple treatment vs. observation group ) , male partner > 18 year age < 50 year age Female partner > 18 year age < = 40 year age randomization stratify two group female partner < 35 female partner > =35 Evidence hysterosalpingogram Saline Infusion Sonogram one patent tube regular ovulatory cycle define recruit site > 25 day < 35 day duration female partner Evidence bilateral grade I unilateral grade IIIII varicocele physical exam male partner Abnormal semen analysis define WHO II criterion sperm count > 5 X106 /ml presence abnormal strict morphology define Kruger criterion . The presence retrograde ejaculation uncorrectable ejaculatory dysfunction Decreased ovarian reserve female partner evidence day # 3 FSH > 12 mIU/ml
